verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. The YY <WH3068> said <WH5002> <WH8803> unto my YY <WH113>, Sit <WH3427> <WH8798> thou at my right hand <WH3225>, until I make <WH7896> <WH8799> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> thy footstool <WH1916> <WH7272>.
The YY <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> <WH8799> the rod <WH4294> of thy strength <WH5797> out of TZiyon <WH6726>: rule <WH7287> <WH8798> thou in the midst <WH7130> of thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

Thy people <WH5971> shall be willing <WH5071> in the day <WH3117> of thy power <WH2428>, in the beauties <WH1926> of holiness <WH6944> from the womb <WH7358> of the morning <WH4891>: thou hast the dew <WH2919> of thy youth <WH3208>.
The YY <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738>, and will not repent <WH5162> <WH8735>, Thou art a Kohen <WH3548> for ever <WH5769> after the order <WH1700> of Malki-TZedek <WH4442>.
The YY <WH136> at thy right hand <WH3225> shall strike <WH4272> <WH8804> through kings <WH4428> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath <WH639>.

He shall judge <WH1777> <WH8799> among the heathen <WH1471>, he shall fill <WH4390> <WH8804> the places with the dead bodies <WH1472>; he shall wound <WH4272> <WH8804> the heads <WH7218> over many <WH7227> countries <WH776>.
He shall drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of the brook <WH5158> in the way <WH1870>: therefore shall he lift up <WH7311> <WH8686> the head <WH7218>.
